problem_text_cn: 如图,为测量某物体AB的高度,在D点测得A点的仰角为30°,朝物体AB方向前进20米,到达点C,再次测得点A的仰角为60°,则物体AB的高度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in order to measure the height of an object AB, the elevation angle of point A is measured at point D as N_0, and the elevation angle of point A is measured at point D N_1, reaching point C, and the elevation angle of point A is measured again as N_2, then the height of object AB is ( )
raw_answer: 解:∵在直角三角形ADB中,∠D=30°,∴\frac{AB}{BD}=tan30°∴BD=\frac{AB}{tan30{^°}}=√{3}AB∵在直角三角形ABC中,∠ACB=60°,∴BC=\frac{AB}{tan60{^°}}=\frac{√{3}}{3}AB∵CD=20∴CD=BD-BC=√{3}AB-\frac{√{3}}{3}AB=20解得:AB=10√{3}．故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查仰角的定义,要求学生能借助仰角构造直角三角形,并结合图形利用三角函数解直角三角形．
